about.description: Osiri transforms how you stay informed about the global tech landscape. We continuously monitor and analyze content from over 200 trusted sources, delivering AI-powered summaries in your preferred language. From startup innovations to engineering breakthroughs, get crystal-clear insights within minutes of publication.

cta.description: Access worldwide tech & startup insights as easily as reading local news. Try our 7-day free trial and experience a smarter way to stay globally informed.

cancel.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime from the 'Plan' menu in your app settings.
cancel.question: How do I cancel my subscription?

trial.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial. If you cancel within 7 days, you can use all features for free during the trial period.
trial.question: Is there a free trial?

ai_insights.description: Cutting-edge GPT technology transforms lengthy articles into crystal-clear summaries. Capture key insights in seconds, not hours.
ai_insights.title: AI-Powered Insights
